artist: Delineator: After Hendrik Hondius I; Engraver: Frederik Bouttats; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: portrait of Heindrik Hondius facing left with tools in hand, looking at viewer; wearing cloak with collar; drapery behind; pillar at tight; landscape view in right distance
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

below image in black: [ (six lines in French) Engraveur, et tres bo Deseyntateur.... maintenant il demeure en la Haye/ Henricus Hondius deliniavit, Fredericus Bouttats fecit. Ioan Meyssens excud.]; on sheet in pencil: [1-556]
title: Portrait of Henricus Hondius
